page.title: 12CUDHAM PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content:
CUDHAM SCHOOL IN BIGGIN HILL
Cudham Church of England Primary School on Jail Lane is responsible for the education of 106 pupils and was built in 1856. There are 5 teachers, 2 cleaners, 1 cook and 3 dinner ladies. There is a small playground made of Tarmac, with a netball pitch and it is our winter playground. There is a field with two football pitches, 3 mounds, a sandpit, a tunnel mound, a concrete tunnel and a climbing frame. We play of the field in summer. there is an outdoor swimming pool and two changing rooms. The swimming pool is 1 metre deep, 19 metres long and 4 metres wide. Round the field are hedgerows which have lots of small animals in them. There is also a wood at the bottom of the field.
